评论详情: This dress is SO cute! I wore it to a semi formal event with Mary Jane’s and received so many compliments. It’s very forgiving with the elastic under the bust and the length is perfect. I’m 5’9”, 255ish, 42DD, size 18/20 and the XXL was perfect (even maybe a little loose). I probably could’ve gotten the XL, but I liked that nothing was too tight. It has pockets, but I would only trust them with a lippie or some gum, but not my phone.  I did travel with this dress and even though I steamed it before packing, I still had to steam upon arrival. No biggie, just FYI. I would definitely order again and am looking at other prints now.

I ordered this to have a fun summer dress that I could also wear to the office.  Feels very trad wife, but adorable.  Love the print and the tie across the back.  Pleased with this dress.  Only thing better would be if it had pockets!
The fabric is super soft and feels good on the body. Very good quality and fits very well.The only thing is that the zipper seems a little fragile
My dress came COVERED in bleach stains!! and it wrinkles easy. Its a beautiful dress dont get me wrong, but the dress HAD STAINS EVERYWHERE.

Highly recommend this dtress! I wore this to a wedding and received a lot of nice compliments. The material is flowing and not a stiff cotton. Very comfortable with an elastic backing. Even when I danced the night away, the material stayed unwrinkled. I would definitely get another in a different color!

I am 5’5” and about 152lbs and I bought a medium. It is slightly snug, but not uncomfortable. Very cute. I wish the lining was closer to the length of the dress, but it’s not a deal breaker for me. The material is a bit thin, and not amazing quality, but it looks really good.

I have always wanted a dress like this!  It is so beautiful!  The fabric is so soft!  It looked very flattering.  It gave me such joy and confidence to wear such a beautiful dress!  It was way too big when I got a large so I returned, sized down to a Medium and it fit amazing!  It is a little big in the chest area, but I'm 14 so I expected that.  I paired it with some tights and Mary Janes and my look was complete!  A great zipper quality as well!  It has a great value to me now.
True to size very cute!! Got so many compliments on it. Fits  great.
I love everything about this dress the fit is perfect xl. Looks great on me. Looks exactly as pictured.
It's not very flattering
Would maybe be great except it is clearly used and smells strongly of stinky unwashed armpit. I gagged pulling it on and couldn’t even stand it to finish trying it on. Disgusting

评论概述: Barely worn, now has places it's coming apart
评论详情: I got this to wear at work and after maybe 5 4 hour shifts there are a couple of spots where the dress is starting to fray. I work at a library, I don't do anything that would cause this and I am really disappointed. It's a really cute dress but for this price I should have gotten way more use out of it before it started coming apart
I bought the blue dress and it fits perfectly. It's very well made and quality material.
Whenever I wear it, I feel so feminine and pretty! <3
Just didn’t fit well at the chest. With a bra or without. Had to have been a funny batch of patterns..? Terrible size chart
Buy this dress. It’s so gorgeously cute!
Used for a theater show. Pretty and stylish although cut not flattering. Makes you look wider than you are

Bought this dress in an XL for an Alice in Wonderland group costume. Fits great and is very cute! I'm 5'9, 216-ish. The pockets are on the shallow side, but they do exist so that's something. The sleeves are cute and puffy, the elastic isn't too tight. Skirt hits around knee-length and is nice on its own, would be adorably puffy with a crinoline underneath. It's ideal for a larger girl to be Alice as it's not too revealing or thin - just need a little apron!
Looks amazing. I got a 2xl fits like a glove. Wore it for my baby shower, it was so comfy its the perfect shade of pink. Fabric feels great and it wasn’t see through.
Wow this dress for a ladies tea party. Fits well,  and is really pretty.  Lots of compliments.
It fit well. The fabric is nice and lightweight. The appearance is stunning and the quality is really good. It doesn’t wrinkle badly. Definitely good value for the money.
I'll admit I was worried about how this dress would fit since I am plus-sized. However, everything looked great and even slimming. The quality is excellent.
Very cute, fits nicely!
Nice dress, unable to wear at this time.
Beautifully designed!! Love it! It was a gift & we ALL LOVE IT! 🥰 Ty Ty Ty 🥳👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. I feel so pretty in it. The fabric is a nice quality and it is lined. The back is stretchy as well. I have placed a petticoat underneath it and just look at it 💫I feel like I belong in a movie 10 out of 10 dress.

This dress is beautiful, fits perfect, and is a great value. The weight is like perfect, it makes you feel very twirly. The fabric is super easy to wash stuff out too, and it hides stains well (I got ketchup on mine and you can’t even tell)
Bigger then I thought even going off the size chart

I was iffy about buying another dress online after the last didn’t work out well but OMG this dress!!! It is sooo cute! The material is soft and feels like satin almost. There’s a hidden side zipper to make dressing easier. The pockets- what girl doesn’t love a dress with pockets?? It was not cheaply made and the print is so cute. The fit is true to size and I’m loving this dress!!  Update: maybe after 2 times wearing the dress, the material started to “pill.” I’m very sad over this as it’s such a cute dress :(
🎉💃 Quality🌟 Fabric🌟 Fit🌟 Worth it🌟 Apparence🌟
I liked the style of this dress. It was cute and comfortable. The fabric was middling quality. Only issue is that this is clearly designed for a tall woman and the straps can’t be adjusted
I could have size down, but it's perfect either way. It is cute & will be wearing it for my Bachelorette (brunch) . I want to order a few more colors!

This dress is fully lined (not see-through!) and gorgeous. Please be advised that there is a side-zipper. I didn't notice it the first few times, and really struggled to get the dress on and off. But with the zipper it is much easier. So far it has done well in the wash and looks great!

The waist is just a little snug, but I love the material and the color is spot on! It has pockets, which is fantastic... however, the pockets aren't very deep, so don't be too excited if that's what you're looking for in this style. Overall, the dress is mostly comfortable and stylish on a plus-size/curvy figure.

My daughter looked so beautiful in this dress for my bonus daughter's wedding!  She loved the pockets and was so comfortable in it!  It can we machine washed and I hang it to dry.  It irons well.  The material is soft and comfortable.  It's a great dress!

I did not expect to like this dress as much as I do. It's fully lined, has pockets, and a nice smooth material. Something about it just makes me super happy. I wish it had a full back instead of the exposed upper back. There is a side hidden zipper to help get into it. I bought a large and it fit perfectly. I'm 39" bust, 30" waist, 44" hip, 5'7". It's great for spinning too.

I got a medium because the measurements were the closest but it’s too big in the waist and bust, the material is good and the quality is amazing! Super cute if it fit properly, definitely just be careful about the size
Ordered for a sock hop at work. Got many compliments.  Well made

I liked the look of the dress and I liked the quickness that Amazon responded and replaced my order. The fit is perfect. It told me to order large but I usually wear medium and that's what I ordered. Very nice and light material for summer.
the material is so cheap. the high price is very uncalled for. returned. you can totally tell this is made in china from the cheap material.
I don’t like pockets
My new favorite dress. It looks exactly like the pictures. It’s really comfortable material. I can’t wait to get more dresses from this store.
Beautiful and well- made.

Size is not true to size, I got an XL but it was way too big in most areas and the large was too small in the hip area. Doesn’t make any sense honestly. Beautiful dress though and has so much potential.
This is just stunning. It’s made extremely well and washes so beautifully
Ordered this last minute for my sister’s baby shower. Was worried about fit as I have a larger chest, but nope! For perfectly. Received many compliments about it at the shower.

This dress is absolutely beautiful design and fits as expected.  The material, design, and manufacture of the dress are all high quality.  For $42.99 at time of this review, I would definitely recommend this dress for those looking for a long dress for special occasions.  The yellow floral print is a gorgeous look.

I am 5'7" and around 165 pounds. I usually wear a size US medium and somewhere in the size 10-12 depending on the brand. I bought a medium and it's a perfect fit for me. I'm ordering the rest of the colors :D
I am 5'5'' and 175. Large was perfect.

评论概述: I am a fairy now. LOL
评论详情: I am living my fairy/cottage core dreams now! This dress is perfect. It fits well, it looks nice, and it has pockets!!! It is flowy yet not sheer. It is silky and loose. I am on the bigger size, and this fits so well. I love this!

I am so in love with this dress! It is very flattering on. It’s a great length. It has a side zipper for easier access to get it on and off. Has a cute tie in the back. I’m hoping to get a petticoat to wear under it.  Just love it!

评论概述: Very Cute, but a bit short
评论详情: This is an adorable, comfortable dress. The fabric is lightweight and fits well. My only problem is that I'm 5'9" and it hits above the knee. I'd much prefer it below the knee.

This dress seems well made and good quality fabric. It is soft and the dress is lined. The colors are bright and vibrant. And I love that there are pockets! Super cute dress. Sadly, it did not flatter my figure. The sleeves are weird. And it is snug in the chest, sorta smooshes for a pancake boob.
Love this dress, very flattering, nice having a side zipper, great Springtime dress!
I love the fit & the style and of course the cherries!  I get so many compliments even from men!  You will love it…don’t hesitate!
I have a behind that is very round. This dress fits wonderful and I do not have to worry about my backside causing the dress to be lower at the back.

I ordered this dress in a size medium and it fit me like a glove ! I love this dress so much it’s cute and classic. Very lady like and doubles as a house dress. One bonus feature that stood out to me was that it has pockets! I can’t wait to take pictures with this!  The material is nice and strong, this dress should last a while. It has a built in slip underneath which is nice so you don’t have to worry about being compromised. It also has nice ruching around the waist which gives an hourglass figure. I highly recommend !

Super cute dress. It arrived true to size and looks just like the photos. The material is a perfect weight for summer and is soft and flowy. This is well made with no odd hems or loose threads and looks great on my daughter. She absolutely loves that it has pockets and a big enough skirt to twirl.
This dress is well made and lined. Fits absolutely beautifully! More than I could have wished for, I will be wearing this dress all summer long! 10/10

So be warned, this is not a wallflower of a dress if you get yellow! My daughter is not normal a fan of florals, but lately she has been into vintage styling, which looks great on her. Knowing the pale green could wash her out, and shes not a fan of cherries, I went with the yellow. It fits great, just shorter on her due to her height, btu that makes it perfect for summer use. She loves the underslip, and is willing to put up with florals due to its swingability, Its a cute fun dress for vacation, or a summer event.
This dress was entirely too small in the bust area for me. If you're a top-heavy gal, I'd be careful in selecting a size. Overall, the dress was thin and flirty. Suited for spring or summer wear.

I love this dress! The quality is amazing! It falls beautifully. It is wrinkle-resistant. The liner doesn't catch on anything, and is very comfortable!  I've gotten a lot of dresses online that were not anywhere near this level of craftsmanship, but were in the same price range. This really stands out from the pack.  The stitching is beautiful and even. The placement of the stretch panel on the back is ideal. It allows the dress to perfectly fit a range of shapes without having the whole thing made of stretch fabric.  It is absolutely gorgeous! I'll be wearing it on Easter and all year. The colors match what is shown online.  I have a large bust, a short, high waist, and long hips. This looks tailored. But the give on the back panel would provide that fit on lots of body types.  The skirt flows beautifully! I want to wear it all the time, and it is my new favorite dress! The coverage is perfect. It doesn't gap at the armpits. It fully covers my bra. The material is sturdy enough and lined, so panty lines don't show. It hits just below the knee, so it is comfortable to wear at a wide variety of events.  It is the first dress I've felt amazing in since my 2 year old was born. It is incredibly flattering and forgiving. But it also doesn't look like something designed to hide under. I 100% would have been excited to wear it at my lower weights as well, and that's a big part of what makes it feel so incredible! I look and feel beautiful in it.

What a great dress. It fits nicely around the waist and bust. It’s probably good for medium to small bust sized people, like me.  I think large bust sizes may struggle since the fabric doesn’t have very much stretch. The pattern and design are exactly as pictured. Wrinkles fade somewhat when hung to dry. But the deep wrinkles needed a touch of steam to release. The length is good. I wear a small at 5 foot tall and it reaches mid calf. It’s just a really nice light fabric dress for warm weather.

This dress is very pretty. It is a nice material. Not what I expected it to be but overall decent. The yellow on the dress is very vibrant. Would match well with any skin tone. For me, the dress is not very flattering and it’s a little tight in the bust area. the dress comes to about the knee so it’s perfect to wear with sandals or flats. The back half of the dress is flattering. It does have a little tie at the neck area so your back is out slightly. if you have larger breast, maybe size up a little bit as I felt squished in this dress other than that if it’s true to size.

评论概述: Fabric feels flimsy, but nice design!
评论详情: So, this dress does run true to size from my experience. That being said, I am in the petite side, so this dress hung at a long awkward length on me. I am used to having things hemmed to be fair though. The fabric did feel flimsy and a little uncomfortable to me. I felt that when for being long, the skirt just hung a bit limp. The elastic on the sleeves seemed to slide around and itch in the time I was trying this on. The back tied easily and the side zipper was a nice touch to help get this on and off. I do like the inner fabric layer to add a little thickness to the dress, and the design is nice. I can see where the vintage design can be indicated, but in my opinion, when I had this on it didn't resemble many of the iconic vintage dresses you often see. Still, it's a nice dress and I'll probably wear it around for a day to further test this once the weather warms up!

This dress is adorable. It's currently priced at $42 and for that price, it's a 5 star dress- the dress is lined (which is rare these days), there are pockets, the cut is flattering, and the sewing quality is good with straight lines and no crooked pieces. I have the dress in yellow which is bright and perfect for spring and summer.  Now that said, the fabric is a little stiffer than I would like and I tend to veer towards natural fabrics these days but this is not a dress that would cost $42 if it was actually cotton. I wish it was just a smidge lower cut but I would say this is a pretty modest cut dress and the hemline hits me just below the knee (I am 5'8).  All in all, this is a good quality dress for the price. I have quite a few things from Belle Poque and they've held up for a long time so I know when I'm buying from them, I'm getting good stuff.

Came across this dress and loved that it was black and had cute, little red cherries printed all over it. It's not totally my style but I'd like to have more pieces like this in my closet. I decided to order it. I tried it on a couple days ago and LOVED it! I was surprised to discover it has pockets! That made it even better. It's a good length, fits great, and is very comfortable. I'm really happy with this dress and I'm looking forward to wearing it on date nights. Would be nice to wear on Valentine's Day.

评论概述: Charming Vintage Dress with a Perfect Fit and Comfort
评论详情: This 1950s cottagecore cocktail dress has exceeded our expectations in both style and comfort.  First and foremost, the fit of this dress is impeccable. My daughter, who typically wears a size 8/10, found this dress to fit her perfectly. It hugs the right places while still allowing for movement, creating a flattering, elegant, and comfortable silhouette.  The material of the dress was a pleasant surprise. Contrary to our expectations, the fabric is incredibly soft and comfortable against the skin. It feels high quality and durable, promising many wears without losing its charm or comfort. The comfort factor is crucial for my daughter, who is a yoga instructor and values feeling good as much as looking good in her clothing.  Moreover, the dress features pockets - a detail that both my daughter and I are thrilled about. Pockets add not only practicality but also a casual ease to the overall design, making the dress even more versatile and functional for everyday wear or special occasions.  The square neck and puff sleeves add a touch of vintage elegance, enhancing the cottagecore aesthetic that is both trendy and timeless. The dress's design manages to be both eye-catching and understated, making it suitable for a variety of events, from casual gatherings to more formal affairs.

This dress is gorgeous and is comfortable to wear!  The fabric is thin and satiny so it will be nice and cool during the summer.  The pockets are a wonderful touch but I wouldn't put something too heavy in them as it would weigh the dress down and make it look uneven.  The length is wonderful and there is a slip liner so it is not sheer or see-through.  I ordered according to the bust measurement on the size chart and it fits perfectly!  For reference, I'm 5'8" and 165 pounds with a bust measure of ~39".

Ordered this for my partner and ordered an XL just to be safe, since clothing on Amazon is hit or miss in regards to fit.  We actually had to take it to a seamstress to have it taken in for her.  Quality feels pretty good and the stitch work is solid.

First of all, the dress is absolutely gorgeous in person. The colors are vibrant and it's a well made piece. Second, the fit is pretty dead on, as far as I can tell it's very true to size.  I do have one complaint and that's the fact that the stress seems to be made for somebody who's at least 5'10" because of you're any shorter than that it just seems like it's too long. I'm petite as it is so I'm used to things being long on me, but it's still pretty long even on my friend who is 5'8". If you try to wear a petticoat with it to make it bounce out, it doesn't really work because you'd expect the dress to hit at about knee-length for that and this is far longer. It's not a deal breaker by any means, I just wish the dress was shorter and I think at this point I may take it to a tailor and have them shorten it professionally because it really is a beautiful dress.
-True to size -Nice fabric -Not flattering at all -Probably wouldn't reorder

I love this dress! It's really flattering. The bust is a tiny bit tight. I happen to be fat with a chest that hasn't quite caught up in size, so it still works for me but sizing up might be necessary for some people. The rest of the dress fits nicely. There is a side zipper but I'm able to put it on without unzipping, which is good because it doesn't seem as though it would last long and I have a feeling it would stick after a few uses. The fabric is light and comfortable. Overall it's a great dress!

评论概述: Wife loves it, but it runs a littel smaller than expected
评论详情: Wife loves everything about this dress except it runs a bit small through the upper area/chest. She orderd the same size she always does, but it is a bit snug accross the upper torso. Everything else is great. She loves the cut, the design, the length. Says the material is very comfortable. The stitching is very good. The overall finish of the dress is excellent. Might check on an exchange or order a size up instead. The design is one of her favorites among all her dresses. Good product, just check the measruements closley before ordering.

This is a really great dress. I am typically a size 8 so I ordered a medium and it fit really well. The only issue I have with it is the strings to tie in the back of the dress. Those are basically pointless. You cannot see them with your hair down and they are a pain to tie with the dress on. It is super comfortable and the hubby said it looks super cute so win, win... Oh, did I mention it has pockets? lol... I love dresses that have pockets.
This is an absolutely adorable dress.  It is beautiful.  It looks like a fun and retro.  The fitting is gorgeous. It's very true to size.  The size chart is accurate.  Looks exactly as pictured.

I love this dress for so many reasons!! Cherries It’s so soft Fits like a glove The flexibility when wearing it is like no other dress I’ve ever worn POCKETS it has a lining and it’s BUILT SUPER WELL the length is absolutely perfect for a tea dress or even dress Cottagecore design with the tie in then back is my everything in my clothing these days. But seriously though - POCKETS!!

评论概述: Size Chart Accurate, Comfy Retro Dress
评论详情: I got size XL, and I am 5'3" & 30K/40-35-38. It has a slightly loose fit on me all over. Would recommend to size down if you are less busty than myself. It's pretty roomy in the arms (which is a little unflattering for me, but will work for more people). It has a built-in slip. I wish that the pockets were a bit deeper as usual with this brand. Nice breathable comfy dress for Spring/Summer.

The sleeves are odd to me. They don’t seem to fit the style of the dress. I can’t pinpoint what i dislike about them, and I don’t feel like they look like the ones pictured, they’re slightly shorter and less poufed.  The skirt is long and flowy. It hits at least 3 inches below the knee on me (5’6”). The dress has two pockets which is nice. The material has a soft feel to it. I like that the dress is fully lined.

Love the vintage style and design of this dress. It’s a polyester fabric that has a silky feel and should wash up nicely without ironing. It has the typical side zipper you would find in a 50’s dress and has pockets. The plus I’d it is fully lined so no reason to wear a slip. I usually wear an xl - 1X. Knowing most imports run small I ordered a size up. It was still too small in the bust. Makes me want to cry since I love this dress and does not come in a larger size.
